language.description: Add HTML injection points for banners, scripts and custom CSS.

specs.title: HTML header
specs.description: Code to add at the bottom of the <head> segment (E.G. <script> and <style> tags)

specs.title: Header bottom
specs.description: Code to add at the bottom the HTML header wrapper. Useful for logos or full width ads.

specs.title: Pre-content
specs.description: Code to add inside the content wrapper, between sidebars. Useful for responsive ads just before the initial contents.

specs.title: Content Top
specs.description: Code to add after the header and before the content wrapper. Useful for leaderboard ads.

specs.title: Pre-footer
specs.description: Code to add after the content wrapper and before the footer. Useful for leaderboard ads.

specs.title: Pre-EOF
specs.description: Code to add below the footer, outside of the content wrapper, before closing the <body> tag. Useful for hidden contents, manipulated with JavaScript.
